title: Crow with Peacock Feathers (Krähe mit Pfauenfedern) (in-text plate (page 29) from Tierfabeln des Aesop (Aesop's Fables)
medium: One from an illustrated book with thirty-five woodcuts (including woodcut cover, title page and ornamental initials)
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 1 3/4 x 3 9/16" (4.4 x 9 cm); page: 13 x 9 1/16" (33 x 23 cm)
